Easter message

2006-04-16

"... Easter represents a demand as well as a promise, a demand not that we sympathize with the crucified Christ, but that we pledge our loyalty to the risen One. That means an end to all loyalties, to all people, and to all institutions that crucify...." - William Sloane Coffin, 1924-2006
